headline: Medtronic’s Hugo robot wins CE mark for vessel-sealing technology
summary: With EU CE mark clearance for LigaSure RAS, Medtronic expands the Hugo system’s capabilities in gynaecologic and urologic procedures.

raw.headline: Medtronic’s Hugo robot wins CE mark for vessel-sealing technology
raw.summary: With EU CE mark clearance for LigaSure RAS, Medtronic expands the Hugo system’s capabilities in gynaecologic and urologic procedures.

headline: Medtronic gets CE mark for robot-driven vessel-sealing device
summary: Medtronic said its market-leading LigaSure technology can now be used with its Hugo soft tissue robotic surgery system in Europe.

raw.headline: Medtronic gets CE mark for robot-driven vessel-sealing device
raw.summary: Medtronic said its market-leading LigaSure technology can now be used with its Hugo soft tissue robotic surgery system in Europe.

headline: Medtronic : first in the U.S. to offer 400 cm 0.018” peripheral guidewire for transradial access
summary: Medtronic today announced it has entered into an exclusive U.S. distribution agreement with Japan-based Future Medical Design Co., Ltd. to sell specialty and workhorse peripheral guidewires. This...
